title: For the developments existing prior to the publishing of the Regional Plan, condition no
clause_text: For the developments existing prior to the publishing of the Regional Plan, condition no.(ii) above shall be applicable retrospectively to the extent of restricting the fencing and keeping the remaining area free for movement of wildlife.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
